headline: A Look At Merchants Bancorp (MBIN) Valuation After Recent S&P Index Inclusions
summary: Merchants Bancorp (MBIN) has just been added to several S&P indices, including the S&P 600 and S&P 1000, a shift that often brings more attention from index funds and other institutional investors. See our latest analysis for Merchants Bancorp. The index additions line up with strong momentum in Merchants Bancorp’s share price, with a 34.66% 1 month share price return and 53.00% 3 month share price return, while the 5 year total shareholder return of 125.38% points to a solid long term...
